headline: KKR Making Competing Bid for Equipment Maker Spectris
summary: The private-equity firm plans to bid against rival Advent International, which submitted a roughly $5 billion proposal.

headline: Spectris rejects second KKR proposal in favour of Advent's $5 billion bid
summary: Britain's Spectris said on Friday it had rejected a second takeover proposal from private equity firm KKR, days after the scientific instruments maker backed a possible competing $5 billion bid from...
